House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00626
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING A CARABAO CENTER IN THE CITY OF LIGAO IN THE PROVINCE OF ALBAY, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7307, ENTITLED "AN ACT CREATING THE PHILIPPINE CARABAO CENTER TO PROPAGATE AND PROMOTE THE PHILIPPINE CARABAO AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GONZALEZ, FERNANDO V.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Belaro (084 2017-05-02)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-01-17
          -The deliberation was deferred pending determination of the exact location of the carabao center.
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-02
          -Approved pursuant to Section 44 of the Rules of the House of Representatives, 17th Congress, without amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB05681
